data.label: 讯飞 SDK
data.description: 讯飞开放平台作为全球首个开放的智能交互技术服务平台，致力于为开发者打造一站式智能人机交互解决方案。

data.label: iFlytek SDK
data.description: iFlytek Open Platform is the world's first open intelligent interactive technology service platform, dedicated to providing developers with one-stop intelligent human-computer interaction solutions.
